document.full_text: on the same day the san francisco giants lost third baseman pablo sandoval for 4-6 weeks with a broken bone in his right wrist, the washington nationals said that ryan zimmerman will miss at least an additional six weeks.
document.title: a bad day for star third basemen
lines_and_colors: on the same day the san francisco giants lost third baseman pablo sandoval for 4-6 weeks with a broken bone in his right wrist, the washington nationals said that ryan zimmerman will miss at least an additional six weeks.
